name: Spinner's Backpackers
description:
Perths favourite hostel re-launched. The new Spinners is now open.

With 25 years experience as Perth’s most chilled hostel, we’ve had some time to design the perfect zones for you. Those same chilled vibes are still here. But everything else is new. Like the new design led bedrooms with personalised charging stations aside every bed, bathrooms with built in hairdryers, wrap around garden courtyard commercial kitchen and air-conditioning in every room. Oh, and the really, really, really fast free internet. 

Whatever Hostel life means to you – Netflix on the couch, drinking in the alfresco garden, entertaining with a late arvo BBQ or just a drink and a game of pool. Spinners has you.

Situated on the fringe of Northbridge, you’re where all the locals wish they lived.  With all the local cafes, shops, bars and nightclubs just down the street you’ve got the best of both worlds. Close enough to walk– but far enough away so you don’t get that late noise noise and riff-raff. We also have a free cat buss service will pick you up 3min from the front door and take you to any of the Perth City tourist locations. We are happy to assist in any other travel arrangements you may require, including tours, Rottnest trips, day activities and airport shuttle services.  

We are an international backpacker hostel requiring our guests be 18+ years of age and have a foreign passport for identification.

houseRules.notes:
You must have an international passport.

After Hours please ring the doorbell at the front gate or call us ( our contact number could be found in your confirmation letter).

Noise:

For the comfort of all guests, Spinner's Hostel has a no noise policy after 10:30pm in all dorms and a low noise policy in communal areas after 11:00pm. Outside music is strictly prohibited starting at 11:00pm and music/TV inside is permitted during quiet hours but must be kept on a low volume.

Reception hours:

Reception is open from 7am till 11pm 7days a week. Checkin/out available 24hrs, just email Admin@spinnershostel.com.au or ask at reception 24hrs prior.

House rules:

Valid photo identification in the form of a passport is required at check-in. 

At Spinners we want you to have fun - but not at the expense of the other guests. There'll always be a manager around - so please respect their requests. Failure to do so could result in you being asked to leave the Hostel in which event all Charges and Additional Charges shall become immediately payable by the guest.

Inside the Hostel is smoke free - but there are outside designated smoking areas. We know you'll be courteous to the other guests.

If something is damaged, soiled or lost you may be liable for any reasonable cost of repairing, cleaning or replacing said item. Everything in Spinners is nicer than the average hostel so we ask you to take a little extra care.

Spinner's Hostel does not accept bookings if you're under the age of 18.
